titles: The great and popular objection against the repeal of the penal laws & tests briefly stated and consider'd, and which may serve for answer to several late pamphlets upon that subject / by a friend to liberty for liberties sake.
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
publisher: Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle ...,
notes: Attributed to Penn. Cf. Wing; NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library and University of Michigan Libraries.
